[File: consensus/src/pipeline/execution_wait_phase.rs] [Struct: ExecutionWaitRequest] [Lifetime safety] Are there any lifetime or ownership issues with the ExecutionFut that could lead to use-after-free vulnerabilities or invalid memory access when the future is awaited? (Critical)
